title: How to Get Sprouts in Plants vs Zombies 2

steps.headline: Launch Plants vs Zombies 2.
steps.description: Look for the game app on your device. Its name is PvZ 2 with the app icon of a zombie’s face. Tap on it.

steps.headline: Select a World.
steps.description: There are many Worlds within the game. Each World has its own theme, set of plants, and set of zombies. You can choose among Ancient Egypt, Pirate Seas, Wild West, Far Future, Dark Ages, Big Wave Beach, and Frostbite Caves, with many more to come. Swipe left and right on the screen to select the World you want to play, and tap on it.

steps.headline: Select a level.
steps.description: Within each World are many levels. Each level can have a different set of zombies and goals. You can only play a level you’ve already completed or the level right after the last one you’ve completed. Tap on the button with the level number to start the game.

steps.headline: Select plants.
steps.description: On the level where you can select your own plants, you will be presented with your inventory of plants. Tap on the ones you want to use for the game. Be sure you have a plant that will give you sun and plants that can attack and defend your base.

steps.headline: Tap on the “Let’s Rock!” button to begin your game.
steps.description: Start by planting the plant that will give you sun, and then strategize from there.

steps.headline: Collect sprouts.
steps.description: Some zombies you defeat will drop sprouts. Sprouts are basically pots with a small plant inside. When you see one, tap on it to collect it.

steps.headline: Launch Plants vs Zombies 2.
steps.description: Look for the game app on your device. Its name is PvZ 2 with the app icon of a zombie’s face. Tap on it.

steps.headline: Tap on the “Play Event” button at the bottom of the screen to play it.
steps.description: Daily Events are special and unique games not found on any of the Worlds or levels. These get refreshed every day. Once you completed a Daily Event, you can no longer play it again.

steps.headline: Complete the Event.
steps.description: Meet the goals of the Daily Event and defeat the zombies. You won’t get any reward if you aren’t successful.

steps.headline: Whack open 3 party piñatas.
steps.description: When you complete the Daily Event, you will be given a screen containing 16 party piñatas. Tap on three of these to uncover rewards. Rewards can range from a small amount of coins to 3,500 coins. They can also contain special plant costumes, gems, or sprouts.

steps.headline: Launch Plants vs Zombies 2.
steps.description: Look for the game app on your device. Its name is PvZ 2 with the app icon of a zombie’s face. Tap on it.

steps.headline: Tap on the shopping cart button on the top right corner of the screen.
steps.description: You will see the PvZ 2 Store with all the items for sale under the different tabs.

steps.headline: Tap on the Sprouts tab to see all the sprout packages in the store.
steps.description: There are five different sprout packages available, ranging from 3 sprouts at 20 gems to 50 sprouts at 150 gems. You cannot buy sprouts with coins or real money.

steps.headline: Buy a sprout package.
steps.description: Tap on the price button for the sprout package you want to buy. You have to have enough gems to cover the purchase. The number of sprouts bought will be added to your total available sprouts. If you don’t have enough gems, you can purchase more with real money.

text: Playing the Game Launch Plants vs Zombies 2. Look for the game app on your device. Its name is PvZ 2 with the app icon of a zombie’s face. Tap on it. Select a World. There are many Worlds within the game. Each World has its own theme, set of plants, and set of zombies. You can choose among Ancient Egypt, Pirate Seas, Wild West, Far Future, Dark Ages, Big Wave Beach, and Frostbite Caves, with many more to come. Swipe left and right on the screen to select the World you want to play, and tap on it. Select a level. Within each World are many levels. Each level can have a different set of zombies and goals. You can only play a level you’ve already completed or the level right after the last one you’ve completed. Tap on the button with the level number to start the game. Select plants. On the level where you can select your own plants, you will be presented with your inventory of plants. Tap on the ones you want to use for the game. Be sure you have a plant that will give you sun and plants that can attack and defend your base. Tap on the “Let’s Rock!” button to begin your game. Start by planting the plant that will give you sun, and then strategize from there. Collect sprouts. Some zombies you defeat will drop sprouts. Sprouts are basically pots with a small plant inside. When you see one, tap on it to collect it. Playing the Daily Event Launch Plants vs Zombies 2. Look for the game app on your device. Its name is PvZ 2 with the app icon of a zombie’s face. Tap on it. Tap on the “Play Event” button at the bottom of the screen to play it. Daily Events are special and unique games not found on any of the Worlds or levels. These get refreshed every day. Once you completed a Daily Event, you can no longer play it again. Complete the Event. Meet the goals of the Daily Event and defeat the zombies. You won’t get any reward if you aren’t successful. Whack open 3 party piñatas. When you complete the Daily Event, you will be given a screen containing 16 party piñatas. Tap on three of these to uncover rewards. Rewards can range from a small amount of coins to 3,500 coins. They can also contain special plant costumes, gems, or sprouts. Buying Sprouts Launch Plants vs Zombies 2. Look for the game app on your device. Its name is PvZ 2 with the app icon of a zombie’s face. Tap on it. Tap on the shopping cart button on the top right corner of the screen. You will see the PvZ 2 Store with all the items for sale under the different tabs. Tap on the Sprouts tab to see all the sprout packages in the store. There are five different sprout packages available, ranging from 3 sprouts at 20 gems to 50 sprouts at 150 gems. You cannot buy sprouts with coins or real money. Buy a sprout package. Tap on the price button for the sprout package you want to buy. You have to have enough gems to cover the purchase. The number of sprouts bought will be added to your total available sprouts. If you don’t have enough gems, you can purchase more with real money.
